name: OtherSurgeries
title: Other Surgeries
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Other Surgeries.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Other Surgeries.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Other Surgeries are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Other Surgeries are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
